org.aggelos.baztag.api
Class Nabaztag

java.lang.Object
  org.aggelos.baztag.api.Nabaztag

public class Nabaztag
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
sinmaniphel The main class for the API. A Nabaztag thing is identified by its serial number and token. Pretty straightforward : Nabaztag myTag = new Nabaztag(serial, token); NabaztagInstructionSequence instructions = new NabaztagInstructionSequence(); ... boolean result = myTag.execute(instructions); if(!result) { return myTag.getLastErrorMessage(); }

Constructor Detail

Nabaztag

public Nabaztag(java.lang.String serialNumber,
                java.lang.String token)
The only way to create a Nabaztag instance is to provide the two key informations needed to interact with a given nabaztag :

Parameters:
serialNumber - the serial number of the Nabaztag (under the rabbit)
token - (found on your account on my.nabaztag.com)
Method Detail

execute

public boolean execute(org.aggelos.baztag.api.NabaztagInstructionSequence sequence)
This method will execute a sequence of instructions, for example saying something and moving the ears

Parameters:
sequence - your built NabaztagInstructionSequence

getLastErrorMessage

public java.lang.String getLastErrorMessage()
In case the execution ended poorly, will provide the last error message

Returns:
the last error message
